snippet: The Dresden Philharmonic’s distinctive sound enlivened its performance of core Romantic works on Sunday at Avery Fisher Hall.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performance by the Dresden Philharmonic, conducted by Rafael Fruhbeck de Burgos, at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Dresden Philharmonic’s distinctive sound enlivened its performance of core Romantic works on Sunday at Avery Fisher Hall.

headline.seo: Dresden Philharmonic Led by Rafael Frühbeck de Burgos at Avery Fisher Hall
headline.main: Romantic Staples, With Texture and a Tangy Bite
headline.print_headline: Romantic Staples, With Texture and a Tangy Bite
